Generated Narrative: ValueSet loinc-survey-codes

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where CLASSTYPE = 2
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where CLASSTYPE = 4
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where CLASS = LP62408-7 (PANEL.NEONAT)
